var attachmentGR = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
if(attachmentGR.get('table_sys_id', dataSource)){
	answer = true;
}
else{
	var importProp = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
	if(importProp.get('name', 'x_exfo2_cmdb.import_active')){
		importProp.value = false;
		importProp.update();
	}
	gs.info('EXFO Import Complete');
	answer = false;
}]]></condition><conditional>true</conditional><connection_override/><data_source/><entered_time/><map/><max_drift/><name>SG-EXFO Path Connection Elements Import</name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><order>81</order><parent display_value="SG-EXFO Full Import">73391191875370503e867518cebb35bf</parent><partition_method>roundRobin</partition_method><partition_script><![CDATA[(function partitionHash(import_set_row) {
